TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewLinkCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell

summary.span: 表示包含連結的儲存格。

span.span: Represents a cell that contains a link.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是特殊的類型的用來顯示連結。The class is a specialized type of used to display links. 專門保留此類型的儲存格的資料行類型。The is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type. 根據預設，會初始化為新。By default, the is initialized to a new . 若要模式後將現有的資料行內的資料格，設定的資料行作為 [模式] 儲存格的屬性。To pattern the cells within a column after an existing , set the column's property to the cell to use as a pattern. 資料行的資料格相關屬性會包裝函式樣板的儲存格的名稱類似的屬性。The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell. 變更範本的儲存格的屬性值會影響只儲存格以範本為基礎，在變更後會加入。Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change. 變更資料行的資料格相關的屬性值，不過，將更新範本的儲存格和資料行中的所有資料格，如有必要，請重新整理資料行顯示。Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用做為範本。The following code example demonstrates how to use a as a template for a . 對資料行中的任何資料格的樣式變更會影響所有資料行的資料格。Style changes made to any cell in the column affect all of the column's cells. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#120)]

para.span: 當您衍生自並將新屬性加入至衍生的類別，請務必覆寫方法，以便於複製作業期間複製新屬性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 您也應該呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的內容複製到新的儲存格。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

member this.ActiveLinkColor : System.Drawing.Color with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示作用中連結的色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used to display an active link.

value.span: ，表示用來顯示所選連結的色彩。

span.span: A that represents the color used to display a link that is being selected.

value.span: 預設值為使用者在 Internet Explorer 中對停留狀態中的連結色彩的設定。

span.span: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the color of links in the hover state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定主控資料行的屬性也會設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 設定資料行值之後，若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定儲存格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性，類似於此屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫方法，每當您衍生自並將新屬性加入至衍生的類別。Override the method whenever you derive from and add new properties to the derived class.

para.span: 當覆寫衍生類別中呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的屬性複製到新的儲存格，並請務必也將複製的任何已新增至衍生類別的屬性值。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前稱為。 is called just before . 它必須傳回`true`如果在呼叫若要停止共用包含儲存格的資料列的效果。It must return `true` if the call to has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell. 它應該傳回`false`否則。It should return `false` otherwise. 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::LinkBehavior LinkBehavior { System::Windows::Forms::LinkBehavior get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::LinkBehavior value); };
member this.LinkBehavior : System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示連結的行為。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the behavior of a link.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連結行為的範例包括是否連結一律顯示為底線或連結只會顯示底線，當滑鼠指標移過它，以及是否需要按兩下或按一下啟用連結。Examples of link behavior include whether the link always displays an underline or the link only displays an underline when the mouse pointer moves over it, and whether a double click or a single click activates a link. 設定主控資料行的屬性也會設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 設定資料行值之後，若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定儲存格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性，類似於此屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

exception.span: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值不是有效的 值。

span.span: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`，則當瀏覽連結時，會自動設定屬性。When the property is set to `true`, the property is automatically set when the link is visited. 如果它已啟用透過滑鼠或鍵盤來選取它，是瀏覽連結。A link is visited if it has been activated by selecting it with the mouse or keyboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法之前呼叫方法。The method is called just before the method. 它必須傳回`true`如果在呼叫若要停止共用包含儲存格的資料列的效果。It must return `true` if the call to has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell. 它應該傳回`false`否則。It should return `false` otherwise. 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

related.span: 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TrackVisitedState { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.TrackVisitedState : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出當瀏覽連結時，它的顏色是否會改變。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the link changes color when it is visited.

value.span: 如果當選取連結時，它的顏色會改變，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the link changes color when it is selected; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`false`，則屬性將不會自動設為`true`當瀏覽。When `false`, the property will not be automatically set to `true` when visited. 設定主控資料行的屬性也會設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 設定資料行值之後，若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定儲存格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性，類似於此屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

member this.UseColumnTextForLinkValue : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出資料行 屬性值是否會顯示為連結文字。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column property value is displayed as the link text.

value.span: 如果資料行 屬性值會顯示為連結文字，則為 ；如果儲存格 屬性值會顯示為連結文字，則為 。

span.span: if the column property value is displayed as the link text; if the cell property value is displayed as the link text.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定主控資料行的屬性也會設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 設定資料行值之後，若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定儲存格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性，類似於此屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

summary.span: 取得或設定用來顯示先前已瀏覽過的連結之色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used to display a link that has been previously visited.

value.span: ，表示用來顯示已瀏覽連結的色彩。

span.span: A that represents the color used to display a link that has been visited.

value.span: 預設值為使用者在 Internet Explorer 中對已瀏覽連結色彩的設定。

span.span: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the visited link color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定主控資料行的屬性也會設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 設定資料行值之後，若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定儲存格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性，類似於此屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]
